headline.main: MARSHALL BACKS DAVIS'S OIL DEALS; He Declares Facts of Mexican Business Will Be Bared to Disprove 'Nazi' Slur

lead_paragraph: Verne Marshall, head of the No Foreign War Committee, apparently incensed over printed versions of Mexican oil deals in which William Rhodes Davis participated, announced yesterday that the committee had asked Mr. Davis to explain publicly the background of these ventures in detail.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: WAR RELIEF ASSN OF AMER YOUTH INC
